text: Olle Häger (19 September 1935 – 1 November 2014) was a Swedish journalist, television producer, writer and historian. Häger produced, often accompanied by historian Hans Villius, a large number of historical documentaries.Dokumentärfilmaren Olle Häger är död, Sveriges Television, 2 November 2014. In 1986, Häger and Villius were awarded the Stora Journalistpriset.Han har haft en avgörande betydelse, Söderhamns-Kuriren, 3 November 2014. ==References == Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Swedish historians Category:Swedish male writers
title: Olle Häger
